name: In The Mountains
description:
You wake up on a mountain, and start working to get off.

Arrow keys - Moving and jumping

Pixel Game Jam:

Im a beginner coder using mostly block-coding websites, im also trying to learn javascript.

The game engine i used was an online block-coding website called Scratch

And my game was meant to be top-down but i changed my mind since most my top-down games were boring. And i tried to add some adventure theme in it, and i think i did well.

i dont know what else to write XD

also my discord is: EliasTPG2
